name: Brock 'Boulder' Johnson
dialogue_tone: Brock has a deep, booming voice that fills any room, often using playful and childlike expressions intertwined with wrestling jargon and a mischievous sense of humor. His laughter is infectious, capable of uplifting the moods of those around him.

personality_traits.description: Brock's playful antics and humorous demeanor make him a favorite both on and off stage.
Despite his popularity, Brock can be a bit rough and untidy in his personal habits.
Brock is often seen playing with action figures or watching cartoons, displaying a childlike charm.
He is known for his massive appetite and indulgence in large meals.

living_conditions: Brock leads an adventurous lifestyle with both rigorous training sessions and playful leisure activities.
He enjoys a work-life pattern that involves travel and performing in different locations.
Despite his fame, his untidy habits and carefree attitude lead to a somewhat chaotic living environment.
